CWE.description: The Common Weakness Enumeration identifier for the bounty.

CVE.description: The Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures identifier for the bounty.

severity.description: The severity rating of the bounty, formatted as a number.

disclosure_bounty.description: The bounty amount awarded for disclosure of the bounty.

patch_bounty.description: The bounty amount awarded for patching the bounty.

detect_prompt_some_info.description: The prompt that contains some information related to detection of the bounty.

detect_prompt_less_info.description: The prompt that contains less information related to detection of the bounty.

exploit_prompt.description: The prompt that describes how the exploit for the bounty works.

patch.description: The object that contains file paths related to the patch.

^[a-zA-Z0-9_\\-/.]+$.description: The path of the file involved in the patch.

vulnerable_commit.description: The commit hash that contains the vulnerability.

invariant_thresholds.description: The thresholds for the invariant checks.

^[a-zA-Z0-9_\\-]+$.description: The threshold for the invariant check with the given name.

bounty_setup_hosts.description: List of hosts created during bounty setup.

items.description: A host address in the format host:port

invariant_test_paths.description: A list of unit test paths (directories and/or files) used in bounty level check invariants.
